name: LD 46 - Keep the romance alive
description:
This was my Ludum 46 entry but due to a glitch, I missed the deadline and had to remake the game.

I'd still like people to check it out as I thought It was a fun concept and put a lot of effort into it. I think its my best one yet.

AIM:

Get 10 hearts to keep the romance alive, otherwise if the time runs out, your date will leave.

CONTROLS:

WASD and mouse - Movement

Shift  - Rotate object

Esc - Pause 

Left Click on objects to pick them up
